system.description:
“Master this utterance and command the battlefield with your words.” You utter A·Tas, warriors find themselves moving of their own accord.

Spend 1 Beat to manipulate a fighter's perceptions and movement: Slide 2 a fighter in range 3.

Superior Command: +1 Beat to slide two fighters in range 3 instead.

Siwa Mandate: +1 Beat to Slide 4 instead.
